title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Campgrounds
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Campgrounds              Campgrounds      There is no camping available at Nez Perce National Historical Park and Big Hole National Battlefield. Federal, state and private campgrounds are available in the surrounding area. Comprehensive information on camping opportunities on Federal lands in Idaho, Montana, Oregon, and Washington is available at Recreation.gov.  STATE PARKS  Information on state parks is available by clicking the link for the appropriate state:  Idaho State Parks Montana State Parks Oregon State Parks Washington State Parks
